name: Wing 1
description:
> *A Pact squad has gone missing in northern Maguuma, and you and your allies are their only hope for recovery. But the deadly forest isn't the only risk to the rescue operationâ€”the area holds dark secrets and strange magic.*

The Spirit Vale is the first released raid wing and consists of four encounters:
<:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** - A medium difficulty boss that takes increased power damage. 
<:spiritwoods:836193678631764009> **Spirit Woods** - An easy encounter where we have to succeed at a multitude of events.
<:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval** - An easy boss where any kind of DPS is fine.
<:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha** - A medium difficulty boss where any kind of DPS is fine.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank** on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** and <:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval**. Tanking is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.
- One healer will be expected to do **Seeker Control** for <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**.
- One healer will be expected to play **Kiter** on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> <:dps:1176639819191951390> **Non-Healer Roles:**
- Two players not on healer roles will need to go **Condi** for <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** to deal with the `Red Guardian`.

Watch our PoVs in <#1053246449212739604> for videos showing how to do any of the above roles!

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 1 practice run does not explicitly assign any **Cannon** players. There is a **Tank** assigned to a healer, and there are special roles to handle <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** `Seeker Control` and <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha** `Kiting` mechanics.
